name: Paradiddle
description: Paradiddle lets you play drums in VR without the limitations of the real world. It opens up many possibilities for learning how to drum, through an intuitive interface, a realistic sound system and recording-playback capabilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) Storage: 2 GB available space
